DOC.brief_title: Pilot Clinical Evaluation Approved Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot evaluation ass feasibility use ultra-high resolution optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) image characterize lens edge limbal epithelial thickness profile ; lens movement gaze blink ; conjunctival microvasculature include fractal analysis microvascular perfusion map blood flow velocity .
DOC.criteria: The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must least 18 70 year age . The subject 's refractive cylinder must < 1.00 Diopters ( D ) eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/25 good eye . The subject must either neophyte habitual adapt wearer soft contact lenses eye . The subject must normal eye ( i.e. , ocular medication infection type ) . The subject must demonstrate adequate mobility 20/30 vision oculus dexter ( OD ) oculus sinister ( OS ) study contact lens . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication may interfere contact lens wear . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia . Any previous , plan , ocular interocular surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted insitu keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , etc. ) . Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) FDA classification scale , previous history sign contact lensrelated corneal inflammatory event ( e.g. , past peripheral ulcer round peripheral scar ) , ocular abnormality may contraindicate contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Monovision multifocal contact lens correction . Participation contact lens lens care product clinical trial within 14 day prior study enrollment . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . Any infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g. , HIV , self report ) . Suspicion recent history alcohol substance abuse . History serious mental illness . History seizure . Employee investigational clinic ( e.g. , Investigator , Coordinator , Technician )
